"}, {"content": "The victims of the pipe bomb explosion at the Ariana Grande concert in Manchester, England, on May 22, 2017, were mostly young people. The exact number of victims is not yet known, but it is believed to be one of the deadliest terrorist attacks in the United Kingdom since the 1970s.

The victims included 22-year-old Iranian-born British man Ali Alamdari, who was attending the concert with his friend, 24-year-old Iranian-born British man Ali Akbarzadeh. Both were injured in the attack.
